info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 7 at 8:47PM CDT until May 8 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Tangipahoa River At Osyka affecting Pike County.
For the Tangipahoa River...including Osyka...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Tangipahoa River at Osyka.
* WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Pastures and woodlands along with some crop land near the river will be inundated.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON
